message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you, given your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,500,000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm not willing to pay that much. I'm willing to pay $800,000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand your position, but $800,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000. This is my final offer.
I understand that you're willing to come down, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for the product. I think this is a fair compromise.
